description.left: Indicate the donor's menopause status at the time of primary diagnosis. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2434914)
description.right: Indicate the donor's menopause status at the time of primary diagnosis. (Codelist reference: NCI CDE ID: 2434914)

description.left: Indicate the donor's age at which the first menstruation event occurred. (Reference: NCIt C19666)
description.right: Indicate the donor's age of menarche, the first occurrence of menstruation.

description.left: Indicate the total number of pregnancy events experienced by the donor. (Reference: NCIt C106551)
description.right: Indicate the number of pregnancies a donor has had.

description.left: Indicate the number of children the donor has birthed. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2486644)
description.right: Indicate the number of children the donor has birthed.

cancer_type_prior_malignancy.description: The code to represent the cancer type of a prior malignancy using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en) classification.
cancer_type_prior_malignancy.name: cancer_type_prior_malignancy

age_at_prior_malignancy.description: If donor has history of prior malignancy, indicate age at previous diagnosis, in years.
age_at_prior_malignancy.name: age_at_prior_malignancy

laterality_of_prior_malignancy.description: If donor has history of prior malignancy, indicate laterality of previous diagnosis. (Codelist reference: NCI CDE: 4122391)
laterality_of_prior_malignancy.name: laterality_of_prior_malignancy

genetic_disorders.description: Indicate presence of any hereditary genetic disorders. (Reference: Genetic disorder names were standardized using Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/) and NCI Thesaurus)
genetic_disorders.name: genetic_disorders

codeList: Familial Atypical Multiple Mole Melanoma Syndrome (FAMMM)
Hereditary Breast and Ovarian Cancer Syndrome (HBOC)
Hereditary Leiomyomatosis and Renal Cell Cancer (HLRCC)

meta.notes: If the genetic disorder term you use is not included in the controlled terminology, please contact us at https://platform.icgc-argo.org/contact to request it be added. To include multiple values, separate values with a pipe delimiter '|' within your file.

hrt_type.description: Indicate the type of hormone replacement therapy (HRT) the patient has taken or is currently taking.
hrt_type.name: hrt_type

hrt_duration.description: If patient has taken hormone replacement therapy (HRT), indicate how long patient has been taking HRT, in months. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5365433)
hrt_duration.name: hrt_duration

contraception_type.description: Indicate the type of hormonal contraception the patient has taken or is currently taking. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 3264234)
contraception_type.name: contraception_type

contraception_duration.description: If patient has taken hormonal contraception, indicate duration of use, in months. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5206887)
contraception_duration.name: contraception_duration

description.left: Indicate the method of specimen storage for specimen that were not extracted freshly or immediately cultured.
description.right: Indicate the method of specimen storage for specimens that were not extracted freshly or immediately cultured.

description.left: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percent of tumour cells compared to the number of total cells in a specimen. (Reference: NCIt: C159484)
description.right: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of infiltration by tumour cells in a specimen.

notes.right: This field is only required if the specimen is a tumour.

description.left: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percent of a specimen that is positive for inflammatory markers, including the presence of capillary dilatation, edema and increased leukocytes. (Reference NCIt C159479)
description.right: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents local response to cellular injury, marked by capillary dilatation, edema and leukocyte infiltration; clinically, inflammation is manifest by redness, heat, pain, swelling and loss of function, with the need to heal damaged tissue.

notes.right: This field is only required if the specimen is a tumour.

description.left: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a tumour specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc. (Reference caDSR CDE ID 2841241)
description.right: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of reactive cells that are present in a malignant tumour specimen but are not malignant such as fibroblasts, vascular structures, etc.

notes.right: This field is only required if the specimen is a tumour.

description.left: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percent of cells undergoing necrosis compared to the number of total cells present in a tumour specimen. (Reference NCIt C159481)
description.right: Indicate a value, in decimals, that represents the percentage of cell death in a malignant tumour specimen.

notes.right: This field is only required if the specimen is a tumour.
To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.
To prevent data collisions, submitter_id cannot begin with any of the ARGO ID prefixes.  The restricted prefixes include: `DO`, `SP`, `SA`,`TR`,`FU`, `PD`.

description.left: The total number of lymph nodes tested for the presence of cancer. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 3)
description.right: The total number of lymph nodes tested for the presence of cancer. (Reference: NCI CDE ID: 3)

description.left: The number of regional lymph nodes reported as being positive for tumour metastases. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 6113694)
description.right: The number of regional lymph nodes reported as being positive for tumour metastases. (Reference: NCI CDE ID: 6113694)

notes.left: This field is only required if 'lymph_nodes_examined_status' is 'Yes'.

description.left: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage.
description.right: Stage group of the tumour, as assigned by the reporting clinical_tumour_staging_system, that indicates the overall prognostic tumour stage (ie. Stage I, Stage II, Stage III etc.).

description.left: Indicate the donor's performance status grade at the time of primary diagnosis. (Reference: ECOG performance score grades from https://ecog-acrin.org/resources/ecog-performance-status).
description.right: Indicate the donor's performance status grade at the time of primary diagnosis. (Reference source: ECOG performance score grades from https://ecog-acrin.org/resources/ecog-performance-status).

lymph_nodes_examined_status.description: Indicate if lymph nodes were examined for metastases.

program_id.description: Unique identifier of the ARGO program.

submitter_donor_id.description: Unique identifier of the donor, assigned by the data provider.

immunotherapy_type.description: Indicate the type of immunotherapy administered to donor.

codeList: Monoclonal antibodies other than immune checkpoint inhibitors

drug_rxnormcui.name: drug_rxnormcui
drug_rxnormcui.description: The unique RxNormID assigned to the treatment regimen drug.

meta.notes:
This field uses standardized vocabulary from the RxNorm database (https://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm), provided by the NIH.

You can search for RX Norm values through the web interface (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/) or API (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/download/rxnav/RxNormAPIs.html).

For example, to find the rxnormcui based on drug name, you can use: https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxcui.json?name=leucovorin or https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/search?searchBy=String&searchTerm=leucovorin

drug_name.name: drug_name
drug_name.description: Name of agent or drug administered to donor as part of the treatment regimen.

meta.notes:
This field uses standardized vocabulary from the RxNorm database (https://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/rxnorm), provided by the NIH.

You can search for RX Norm values through the web interface (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/) or API (https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/download/rxnav/RxNormAPIs.html).

For example, to find the rxnormcui based on drug name, you can use: https://rxnav.nlm.nih.gov/REST/rxcui.json?name=leucovorin or https://mor.nlm.nih.gov/RxNav/search?searchBy=String&searchTerm=leucovorin

description.right: Indicate the method(s) used to confirm the donor's progression or relapse or recurrence disease status. (Codelist reference: NCI CDE ID: 6161031)

program_id.name: program_id

submitter_donor_id.name: submitter_donor_id

family_relative_id.description: Unique identifier of the relative, assigned by the data provider.
family_relative_id.name: family_relative_id

meta.notes: This field is required to ensure that family members are identified in unique records.  Ids can be as simple as an incremented numeral to ensure uniqueness.

relative_with_cancer_history.description: Indicate if donor has any genetic relatives with a history of cancer. (Reference: NCIt C159104, caDSR CDE ID 6161023)
relative_with_cancer_history.name: relative_with_cancer_history

relationship_type.description: Indicate genetic relationship of the relative to the donor. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 2179937)
relationship_type.name: relationship_type

gender_of_relative.description: The self-reported gender of related individual.
gender_of_relative.name: gender_of_relative

age_of_relative_at_diagnosis.description: The age (in years) when the donor's relative was first diagnosed. (Reference: caDSR CDE ID 5300571)
age_of_relative_at_diagnosis.name: age_of_relative_at_diagnosis

cancer_type_code_of_relative.name: cancer_type_code_of_relative
cancer_type_code_of_relative.description: The code to describe the malignant diagnosis of the donor's relative with a history of cancer using the WHO ICD-10 code (https://icd.who.int/browse10/2019/en) classification.

relative_vital_status.description: Relative's last known state of living or deceased.
relative_vital_status.name: relative_vital_status

cause_of_death_of_relative.description: Indicate the cause of the death of the relative.
cause_of_death_of_relative.name: cause_of_death_of_relative

relative_survival_time.description: Indicate how long, in days, the relative survived from the time they were diagnosed with cancer.
relative_survival_time.name: relative_survival_time
